characters.name: Tatsuhiro Satou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 176 cm (5'9") 

The story's protagonist is a 22-year-old hikikomori and NEET of nearly four years. He is highly unstable, easily manipulated, obsessive, and often blames the N.H.K. conspiracy, a fabrication of his mind, for his shortcomings. He lives in a rented apartment, but depends on his parents' allowance to live.   ~!At the end of the novel, Satou and Misaki promised each other to get married once they finish school.!~

characters.name: Misaki Nakahara
characters.description:
__Height:__ 154 cm

Misaki is a mysterious girl who decides to help [Tatsuhiro Satou](https://anilist.co/character/1839/Tatsuhiro-Satou) escape his hikikomori lifestyle. She convinces him to sign a contract, involving him in her "big project", with the goal of making him an average person. Though seeing right through his actions, she tries reading him (beginner's) psychology books in an attempt to click with his feelings and "save" him.

~!Her backstory varies depending on the media. In the anime, it is revealed later on that the only reason she is helping Satou is to save herself from being worthless. Due to traumatic childhood experiences such as living with her abusive stepfather and seeing her mother committing suicide, she believes that she isn't worth anything and her existence is a reason for people's misfortune. She feels useless and the only way she can live with it is to have someone to rely on her.

However, in the manga and light novel, it is revealed she made those details up in an effort to manipulate and try to help Satou through unconventional means. Her story in the media mentioned above actually involves both her parents being happy, healthy, kind, and wealthy.

Her biological father gave her the name "Misaki" (岬) which means "promontory" in Japanese after the Ishihama Promontory.!~

characters.name: Kaoru Yamazaki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 169 cm (5'6")

Tatsuhiro's former kouhai (Junior) in high school, who is an otaku. Tatsuhiro once stood up for him when he was still in middle school being beat up by some bullies, since then, he respected him greatly and decided to join the literature club with him when he went into high school. He is currently Tatsuhiro's neighbor and a college student aspiring to be a game creator.

characters.name: Hitomi Kashiwa
characters.description:
Satou's senpai in high school, now a public servant. Due to stress, Hitomi develops a dependence on drugs. Hitomi met Tatsuhiro when she persuaded him to join the Literature Club, though most of the time they only ever played card games. She has always been fascinated by the concept of conspiracy theories and introduced Satou to the idea.

~!Satou's longtime crush/love-interest, seemingly the only friend and the only woman in his past, or perhaps the only noteworthy or memorable one. Apparently had an immense influence on his life.  Acted as the catalyst for the actions that made Yamazaki idolize Satou in school and befriend him in the present, as Satou was just trying to show off and look cool in front of Hitomi-Senpai. Took Satou's virginity in high school, giving him goodbye sex when she graduated ahead of him and left him alone.  It is revealed later that Hitomi is part of an online cult at present, and plans to attend an offline meet on a private island where the group will commit suicide together.!~

characters.name: Shizue Satou
characters.description: Shizue Satou is the mother of Tatsuhiro Satou and wife of Tatsuo Satou. She supports her son with an allowance and communicates with him over phone. She also comes to visit him in one episode, during which Misaki Nakahara pretends to be his girlfriend.

characters.name: Megumi Kobayashi
characters.description: Tatsuhiro's classmate in high school, was the class representative back then. They meet frequently in manga, but none of them realizes the existence of each other until later. ~!After her father died, she had to work in order to support herself and her brother, who is also a hikikomori, though ended up entangled in a shady pyramid scheme. During school, she had a very uptight personality which Tatsuhiro commented about himself to her face. After high school, she retains much of this personality, though has also become somewhat manipulative in order to survive.!~

characters.name: Nanako Midorikawa
characters.description: Nanako is one of Yamazaki's classmates. She is studying to become a voice actor.     ~!Yamazaki has a crush on her. In fact, the heroine of the eroge he is working on is based on Nanako's appearance.!~    Manga Spoiler:     ~!As Yamazaki is about to leave Tokyo to inherit the farm, Nanako tells Yamazaki to break up even after Yamazaki's speech because she never actually liked him. Nanako tells Yamazaki that Yamazaki likes "pretty girls", and how she likes them too. She admits that she stalks girls ever since high school and how she only voice acts as shonen male characters in order to be the hero to cute girls and how she picked her hairstyle, as she believed it was something girls would like. She also admits that she only dated Yamazaki to prevent bad rumors.!~

characters.name: Akira Jougasaki
characters.description: Hitomi Kashiwa's boyfriend.      ~!  In one of the episodes, he managed to find out about Hitomi's suicide attempt on an island. Together with Misaki and Kaoru, he rented a yacht and pursued on to that destination. On the brink of Hitomi's attempt to jump off a cliff, he affirmed his love for her and proposed, in which she accepted.!~

characters.name: Yuu Kusano
characters.description: One of the people who were in Hitomi's offline meeting. Usually seen playing video games.

characters.name: Purin
characters.description: Purin is the main character of a famous anime in the world of NHK ni Youkoso! She is a Magical Girl who can transform into some objects, like a pudding or a little barrel. This character is important to NHK ni Youkoso because Yamazaki is in love with Purin, despite the fact that she is only a 2-D cartoon.

characters.name: NHK Agents
characters.description: The make-believe characters working in the NHK (Nihon Hikkikomori Kyokai) in Satou Tatushiro's fantasy during his anti-social years. In Satou's imagination, this group of blue goblins with pink sleeping caps are part of a conspiracy that tries to ruin his life.

characters.name: Douryou
characters.description: A colleague of [Akira Jougasaki](https://anilist.co/character/25437/)'s who appears in the 12th episode.

characters.name: Danshi Seito
characters.description: A background character seen bashing an anime episode that had aired the previous day.
